basic.name: Ryan Jordan
basic.occupation: Software Engineer and CTO/Cofounder @ Geoso, Inc.
basic.bio: Self start entrepreneur and techie with background in software development, engineering, process automation & management. Highly interested in startups and fast paced/high growth organizations. Tinkering is my habit, building is my passion.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

work.title: Cofounder & CTO
work.description:
Cofounded software tech startup 
 Developed autoscaling backend using AWS infrastructure and integrated business APIs 
 Built Android and iOS applications from ground up 
 Managed day to day business operations and product design 
 Performed customer discovery interviews 
 Contractor hiring, management and negotiations 
 Raised over $27,500 in funds/business credits

work.title: R&D Developer
work.description:
Assisted in propping up R&D department at leading west coast architecture firm 
 Lead effort in automation of demographic data mining and aggregation for target markets 
 Utilized machine learning tools to develop application for city expansion analysis and data visualization 
 Streamlined business processes to improve workflow and customer engagement, dramatically reducing man hours 
 Produced VR/AR walkthrough experience for 3D building designs

work.title: Logistics Intern
work.description:
Reorganized and optimized warehouse operations and parts distribution 
 Automated processes for inactive and future inventory cataloging 
 Managed inventory valued in excess of $100 million dollars 
 Facilitated analysis and reorganization of warehouse operational efficiency 
 Enhanced inventory tracker to auto generate labels across over 100,000 different aerospace components

education.description: 1 of 10 startups selected & funded for the 12 week business accelerator modeled after National Science Foundation I-Corp program. Won 2nd place @ Demo Day.
